    def serialize(self):        return {            'article_link': self.article_link,            'article_title': self.article_title,            'publisher_id': self.publisher_id,            'widget_status': self.widget_status,            'date_published': self.date_published,            'edited_by_publisher': self.edited_by_publisher,            'edited_by_newspark': self.edited_by_newspark,        }
